text: Maurizio De Jorio is an Italian italo-disco and eurobeat musician and singer. == Songs == * Max Coveri - Golden Age * Max Coveri - Running In The 90's * Dejo - Loving Eurobeat (& Bon) * Dejo - Boys Gone Wild * Dejo - Wilder Faster Louder * Casanova - Crazy Love == References == Category:Eurobeat Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Italian singers Category:People from Trento
title: Maurizio De Jorio
